properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , GENDER , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , AGE , ENROLL_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER
SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , GENDER , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , AGE , ENROLL_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , GENDER , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , AGE , ENROLL_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE GENDER = ?
